headline: $118.14 Bn Fire Protection System Market - Global Forecast to 2030 with Johnson Controls, Honeywell International, Siemens, Robert Bosch, and Eaton Leading
summary: The global fire protection system market is set to expand from USD 85.06 billion in 2025 to USD 118.14 billion by 2030, growing at a 6.8% CAGR. This growth is fueled by rapid industrialization, urban infrastructure expansion, and stringent global fire safety regulations. Key advancements in IoT-enabled fire monitoring, AI-assisted analysis, and predictive maintenance are enhancing safety measures. headline: $2.88 Bn Aluminum Brazing Markets: Automotive, Aerospace & Defense, Industrial, Electrical & Electronics, Others - Global Forecast to 2032
summary: The global aluminum brazing market, valued at USD 2.05 billion in 2025, is expected to reach USD 2.88 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 5.0%. The aluminum-zinc alloys segment, crucial for HVACR and automotive heat exchangers, continues to thrive due to its superior properties. The wires segment sees robust growth driven by lightweight automotive applications, while the electrical & electronics sector responds to demand for durable components. headline: RFID Market Analysis Report 2026 - Global Forecast to 2034 with Zebra Technologies, Honeywell International, Avery Dennison, HID Global, and Datalogic Dominating
summary: The RFID market is estimated to grow from USD 14.58 billion in 2025 to USD 30.47 billion by 2034, at a CAGR of 8.5%. This growth is driven by rising demand for real-time tracking and data accuracy across retail, logistics, manufacturing, and healthcare. The contactless payments segment will register the highest CAGR, fueled by the demand for quick, secure transactions. headline: Honeywell Spin Off Reshapes Automation Focus And Raises Valuation Questions
summary: Honeywell International (NasdaqGS:HON) plans to spin off its Aerospace division, creating a separate avionics focused company. The move is part of an accelerated portfolio overhaul aimed at sharpening Honeywell's focus on industrial automation and related businesses. Management has highlighted the spin off timeline as a key milestone that will reshape Honeywell's business mix and industry exposure. Honeywell is known for its mix of aerospace systems, industrial automation and building...

headline: A Look At Honeywell International’s Valuation As Earnings Beat And Aerospace Spin Off Plans Advance
summary: Honeywell International (HON) is back in focus after reporting Q4 2025 results that surpassed expectations, raising 2026 adjusted EPS guidance and accelerating plans to spin off its Aerospace division into a dedicated avionics business. See our latest analysis for Honeywell International. headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks We Think Twice About
summary: Wall Street has issued downbeat forecasts for the stocks in this article. These predictions are rare - financial institutions typically hesitate to say bad things about a company because it can jeopardize their other revenue-generating business lines like M&A advisory.
